titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Brooklyn Bicentennial Commission medals 2011.024
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by John Zarrillo

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-03-25T10:14-0400

did.abstract: Two medals issued to commemorate the 1976 United States bicentennial. Both medals were designed by Alfred Görig, and produced by the Brooklyn Bicentennial Commission in 1976. One medal depicts the Battle of Long Island (also known as the Battle of Brooklyn), while the other honors the Wallabout Bay prison ship martyrs.
